mapper.delete: delete from WEB_HOUSE where S_ID in (select S_ID from SHOP_INFO where ARCHIVE_ID = #{archiveId}) delete from T_HOUSE_TRENDS where S_ID in (select S_ID from SHOP_INFO where ARCHIVE_ID = #{archiveId}) delete from ORDER_HISTORY_LOG where fk_order_id in (select ords.id from ORDERREF_DATA ord left join ORDERREF_DATASUB ords on ords.fId = ord.id where S_ID in (select S_ID from SHOP_INFO where ARCHIVE_ID = #{archiveId})) delete from ORDERREF_DATASUB where fId in (select id from ORDERREF_DATA where S_ID in (select S_ID from SHOP_INFO where ARCHIVE_ID = #{archiveId})) delete from ORDERREF_DATA where S_ID in (select S_ID from SHOP_INFO where ARCHIVE_ID = #{archiveId})
